FuncDef: This command creates a context to configure a network queue policy. Network queue policies define the ingress network queuing at the XMA or MDA network node level and on the Ethernet port and SONET/SDH path level to define network egress queuing.

ParaDef.Info: The name of the network queue policy. Values-Valid names consist of any string up to 32 characters, composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, etc.), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes..
Required keyword when creating a network queue policy.
